title: Apple TV+ head of film marketing strategy resigns after a year and a half on the job
content:
Apple TV+ head of film marketing strategy JP Richards has resigned. Sources tell Variety that Richards notified his team of his departure this morning. 

more…

The post Apple TV+ head of film marketing strategy resigns after a year and a half on the job appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV+ Head of Film Marketing Strategy, JP Richards has resigned after joining the tech giant in January of last year.
